power.title: Awaken the Slumbering Hurt
power.fluff: Your foes' wounds allow you to dodge at just the right angles to foil their attacks and when you attack, you focus on a single enemy's injuries and find the perfect place to strike

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes extra damage from your next attack equal to your Strength modifier. The attack must be made before the end of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move up to your speed. During this movement, bloodied enemies cannot trigger actions based on your movement.

power.title: Balance Restored
power.fluff: Dropping into a wide stance helps you deliver the greatest impact, while also ensuring that you can deal with any counterattacks that follow

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the target up to a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You push the target up to a number of squares equal to one-half your Strength modifier.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift 1 square.
Until the start of your next turn, when an enemy adjacent to you attacks you, you can knock that enemy prone after the attack is resolved.

power.title: Call up the Savage Wind
power.fluff: A stiff gust rises up to scatter your enemies and speed you over treacherous terrain

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the blast

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Dexterity modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You can slide each target 1 square.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move up to your speed, ignoring difficult terrain.

power.title: Drunken Monkey
power.fluff: You lurch seemingly out of control, bewildering them as they try to hit your swaying form until your cunning jab causes one of your foes to attack its companion

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target makes a melee basic attack as a free reaction against one enemy of your choice. It gains a bonus to its damage roll equal to your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move your speed + 2. During this movement, you ignore difficult terrain and gain a power bonus to all defenses. The bonus equals your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Eagle Claw Strike
power.fluff: Your leap is so graceful that you seem to hang in the air for a short period and when you land, you deliver a shattering strike

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature, or one unattended object

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Fortitude
If you have not moved this turn, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll against an unattended object.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes a penalty to AC equal to one-half your Strength modifier until the end of your next turn.
Against an unattended object, this attack deals an additional +2d8 damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Against an unattended object, this attack deals half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You fly your speed. If you don't land at the end of this movement, you fall.

power.title: Gentle Rainfall
power.fluff: You strike many foes, then evade strikes faster than they thought possible

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each enemy you can see in the burst

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d10 + Dexterity modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift 1 square for each creature you hit.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift 1 square, or move 3 squares.
If you use the Movement Technique after using the Attack Technique, you can shift 1 additional square for each two creatures you hit, or move 1 additional square for each creature you hit.

power.title: Laughing Wind
power.fluff: Your attack summons a laughing wind that drags your foes across the battlefield

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier damage.
Until the start of your next turn, as a free reaction, you can slide any creature that ends its turn in a square adjacent to you a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Until the start of your next turn, as a free reaction, you can slide any creature that ends its turn in a square adjacent to you up a number of squares equal to one-half your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1 square).

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the start of your next turn, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses against attacks triggered by your movement.
You move your speed.

power.title: Light the Fire
power.fluff: Bright flames dance across your body, scorching enemies you strike and swirling around you to immolate foes in your reach

part.keyword: Aura, Fire, Full Discipline, Implement, Psionic

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier fire damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You activate an Aura 1 (Fire, Implement, Psionic) that lasts until the start of your next turn.
Any enemy that starts its turn in the aura takes fire damage equal to your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift up to 3 squares.

power.title: Open the Gate of Battle
power.fluff: Your sudden movement catches your foe unprepared, and you launch into an attack

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Reflex
If the target has not yet acted in this encounter, you gain combat advantage for this attack

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier damage.
The target takes 1d10 extra damage if it was at full hit points when you hit with this attack.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move your speed + 2. You do not trigger attacks based on your movement from creatures that have not yet acted during this encounter.
If you use this Movement Technique before using the Attack Technique, your movement also does not provoke opportunity attacks from one creature adjacent to you when you start the movement.

power.title: Rising Storm
power.fluff: The air around you hums with power as you focus the energy within you into a roar of thunder

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier thunder damage, and each enemy adjacent to the target takes thunder damage equal to your Strength modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Thunder damage equal to your Strength modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You fly your speed. If you don't land at the end of this movement, you fall.
If you used the Attack Technique before using this Movement Technique, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses against attacks triggered by this movement.

power.title: Scattering of Leaves
power.fluff: You drive two enemies back with quick strikes, then use the momentum of your attacks to scatter other foes

section.name: Primary Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the primary target 1 square.
You shift 1 square.

section.name: Secondary Target:
section.text: One creature other than the primary target

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the secondary target 1 square.
You then push each enemy adjacent to the secondary target 1 square from the secondary target.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You make an Athletics check to jump with a +5 power bonus. You are considered to have a running start, and the distance of the jump isn't limited by your speed.
